description: The initiative focuses on the designation of origin for the Criollo goat from northern Neuqu√©n, Argentina. This project aims to enhance the value of local goat production, improve marketing strategies, and preserve traditional breeding practices. Established in 2010, it involves collaboration among local breeders, the National Institute of Agricultural Technology, and regional authorities. The initiative seeks to promote the unique qualities of the Criollo goat while ensuring sustainable production methods and fostering community identity.
name: Chivito Criollo
